Absolve.definition: to set free or release from some obligation or responsibility [a judgment terminating a parent's rights… s that parent of all future support obligations " In re Bruce R.
Absolve.origin: [a judgment terminating a parent's rights… s that parent of all future support obligations " In re Bruce R. , 662 A.2d 107 (1995)"]

1.definition: to set free or release from some obligation or responsibility [a judgment terminating a parent's rights…that parent of all future support obligations ", 662 A.2d 107 (1995)"]

2.definition: to determine to be free of fault, guilt, or liability [a jurythe defendant of any negligence ", 438 P.2d 74 (1968)"]
